chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
R: list card
y0: string
x0: string
y: list nat
x: list nat
B: list (list nat * list nat)

Goal:
B <<= P -> x <<= Sigma -> y <<= Sigma -> #_L x ++ tau1 B = # :: #_R y ++ tau2 B -> exists A : list (string * string), A <<= x0 / y0 :: R /\ x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
P = [d; e] ++ map (fun '(x / y) => #_L x / #_R y) (filter (fun '(x / y) => is_cons x || is_cons y) (x0 / y0 :: R)) : list (list nat * list nat)
tau2 = fix tau2 (X : Type) (A : stack X) {struct A} : PCP.string X := match A with | [] => [] | _ / y :: A0 => y ++ tau2 X A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> PCP.string X Arguments tau2 {X}%type_scope
string = PCP.string nat : Type
Sigma = sym (x0 / y0 :: R) : list nat
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
tau1 = fix tau1 (X : Type) (A : stack X) {struct A} : PCP.string X := match A with | [] => [] | x / _ :: A0 => x ++ tau1 X A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> PCP.string X Arguments tau1 {X}%type_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope
MPCP_PCP : forall (x y : list nat) (A : list (string * string)), A <<= x0 / y0 :: R -> x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A -> exists B : list (list nat * list nat), B <<= P /\ #_L x ++ tau1 B = # :: #_R y ++ tau2 B
MPCP = fun '(x / y / P) => exists A : stack nat, A <<= x / y :: P /\ x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A : PCP.card nat * stack nat -> Prop
MPCPb = fun '(x / y / P) => exists A : stack bool, A <<= x / y :: P /\ x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A : PCP.card bool * stack bool -> Prop
match_start : forall (d' : list nat * list nat) (B : list (list nat * list nat)), d' :: B <<= P -> tau1 (d' :: B) = tau2 (d' :: B) -> d' = d
tau2_app : forall A B0 : stack ?X, tau2 (A ++ B0) = tau2 A ++ tau2 B0 where ?X : [R : list card x0 : string y0 : string x : list nat y : list nat B : list (list nat * list nat) |- Type]
tau1_app : forall A B0 : stack ?X, tau1 (A ++ B0) = tau1 A ++ tau1 B0 where ?X : [R : list card x0 : string y0 : string x : list nat y : list nat B : list (list nat * list nat) |- Type]
P_inv : forall c : list nat * list nat, c el P -> c = d \/ c = e \/ (exists x y : string, x / y el x0 / y0 :: R /\ c = #_L x / #_R y /\ x / y <> [] / [])
incl_lrcons : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), x :: A <<= x :: B -> ~ x el A -> A <<= B
incl_app_left : forall (X : Type) (A B C : list X), A ++ B <<= C -> A <<= C /\ B <<= C
incl_rcons : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), A <<= x :: B -> ~ x el A -> A <<= B
itau1_app : forall A B0 : list nat, itau1 ?P (A ++ B0) = itau1 ?P A ++ itau1 ?P B0 where ?X : [R : list card x0 : string y0 : string x : list nat y : list nat B : list (list nat * list nat) |- Type] ?P : [R : list card x0 : string y0 : string x : list nat y : list nat B : list (list nat * list nat) |- stack ?X]
itau2_app : forall A B0 : list nat, itau2 ?P (A ++ B0) = itau2 ?P A ++ itau2 ?P B0 where ?X : [R : list card x0 : string y0 : string x : list nat y : list nat B : list (list nat * list nat) |- Type] ?P : [R : list card x0 : string y0 : string x : list nat y : list nat B : list (list nat * list nat) |- stack ?X]
incl_shift : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), A <<= B -> x :: A <<= x :: B
tau1_inv : forall (a : nat) (B : stack nat) (z : list nat), tau1 B = a :: z -> exists x y : list nat, (a :: x) / y el B
tau2_inv : forall (a : nat) (B : stack nat) (z : list nat), tau2 B = a :: z -> exists x y : list nat, y / (a :: x) el B
app_incl_l : forall (X : Type) (A B C : list X), A ++ B <<= C -> A <<= C
Facts.app_incl_l : forall (X : Type) (A B C : list X), A ++ B <<= C -> A <<= C
Facts.app_incl_R : forall (X : Type) (A B C : list X), A ++ B <<= C -> B <<= C
app_incl_R : forall (X : Type) (A B C : list X), A ++ B <<= C -> B <<= C
der_cons : forall (P : stack ?X) (x1 y1 : list ?X) (u v : PCP.string ?X), x1 / y1 el P -> derivable P u v -> derivable P (x1 ++ u) (y1 ++ v) where ?X : [R : list card x0 : string y0 : string x : list nat y : list nat B : list (list nat * list nat) |- Type]
incl_lcons : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), x :: A <<= B < -> x el B /\ A <<= B
doll_hash_L : forall x : list nat, x <<= Sigma -> ~ $ el #_L x
PCPX = fun (X : Type) (P : stack X) => exists A : list (PCP.card X), A <<= P /\ A <> [] /\ tau1 A = tau2 A : forall X : Type, stack X -> Prop Arguments PCPX {X}%type_scope
Facts.cons_incl : forall (X : Type) (a : X) (A B : list X), a :: A <<= B -> A <<= B
cons_incl : forall (X : Type) (a : X) (A B : list X), a :: A <<= B -> A <<= B
list_power : forall A B : Type, list A -> list B -> list (list (A * B))
tau1_cards : forall x1 : list ?X, tau1 (cards x1) = x1 where ?X : [R : list card x0 : string y0 : string x : list nat y : list nat B : list (list nat * list nat) |- Type]
tau2_cards : forall x1 : list ?X, tau2 (cards x1) = x1 where ?X : [R : list card x0 : string y0 : string x : list nat y : list nat B : list (list nat * list nat) |- Type]
der_sing : forall (P : stack ?X) (x1 y1 : list ?X), x1 / y1 el P -> derivable P x1 y1 where ?X : [R : list card x0 : string y0 : string x : list nat y : list nat B : list (list nat * list nat) |- Type]
sym = fix sym (R : stack nat) : list nat := match R with | [] => [] | x / y :: R0 => x ++ y ++ sym R0 end : stack nat -> list nat
